headline: The reality check everyone’s ignoring
summary: Welcome to Today’s Smart Money Roundup. Software stocks are getting crushed, and Barron’s is calling it “overdone.” Salesforce (CRM) is down 27% over the past year despite Wall Street hyping its Agentforce AI platform as a “medium-term growth engine.” The stock’s at $233.54, down 10.4% in just the past week. Snowflake (SNOW) fell 7.1% this ... The reality check everyone’s ignoring

headline: The energy trade that excites VanEck's CEO — and it's not oil
summary: A major exchange-traded fund manager suggests the oil trade won't provide much upside ahead.
